articles.title: American, Alaska Airlines and JetBlue will require employee vaccinations : Coronavirus Updates - NPR
articles.description: The three airlines are joining United in mandating that workers be vaccinated against COVID-19, as the Biden administration steps up pressure on major U.S. carriers to require the shots.
